run() - 类 com.taobao.datax.engine.schedule.ReaderWorker 中的方法
Read data, main execute logic code of Reader
NOTE: When catches exception, ReaderWorker exit process immediately.
run() - 类 com.taobao.datax.engine.schedule.WriterWorker 中的方法

NOTE: When catches exception, WriterWorker exit process immediately
